intro.description: In a few steps, this cheat sheet will show you how to create and export a TestSpecification.

item.title: Create your own TestSpecification
item.description: First, go with the mouse courser in the "GlobalTester Navigator" window. Right-click, and choose "New -> Project...". In the "New Project" wizard, select "GlobalTester -> TestSpecification", and click "Next >". Enter a name for your TestSpecification Project in the text fiel "Project name". Then click "Finish"

item.title: Write a TestCase
item.description: In the "GlobalTester Navigator" window, your own TestSpecification will be shown as a project folder. In its sub-folder TestCases, you can now write a testCase as xml file in the new BSI XML Schema.
